page.title: 04Causes for concern
page.content: This is a very caring community and people are concerned about many conditions in the countryside: pol- lution of streams by sprays, fertilisers, silage effluent, inefficient sewage and rubbish dump- ing; loss of woodlands, hedges, wild flowers, butterflies, some birds. and footpaths. Families with teenagers are worried about unemployment, drugs, distasteful and horrific television,and lack of discipline at school and at home. Farmers are concerned about thieving of stock and implements, EEC imports and regulations, butter and corn mountains and the future of farming, also the urban spread into the countryside. Looking further afield we worry about the nuclear bomb,and starving Africans. Low flying aircraft, heavy vehicles and poor roads worry us also.
